contents.text: Welcome to Zynga in San Francisco, your home for the world’s most popular social games.
For gameplay assistance and troubleshooting, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to a gameplay specialist.

navigationGoals: Quickly troubleshoot a game error that's preventing me from playing.
I need help recovering my game progress in Farmville Clash after reinstalling on my new phone.
Diagnose recurring server timeout errors during match-making on iOS and request a workaround
My game keeps freezing when I try to play—can someone help me fix it?
I need help troubleshooting a persistent glitch where my in‐game resource production freezes whenever I start a new level.

contents.text: For account and billing inquiries, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to our billing department.

navigationGoals: Get billing support to clarify and correct an unexpected charge on my account.
I want to apply my military veteran discount to the recent coin pack I purchased.
Investigate duplicate in-app purchase charges on my account and obtain transaction IDs for refund processing
I see an unfamiliar charge on my billing statement and need help resolving it.
I’d like to review and dispute a recent charge on my account for an in‐app currency purchase.

contents.text: For business and partnership inquiries, press 2.
For partnership and advertising opportunities, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to our partnerships team.

navigationGoals: Discuss an advertising partnership opportunity with the Zynga team.
I represent a veterans nonprofit and want to discuss an in-game fundraising partnership.
Propose integrating my ad network SDK for a co-marketing partnership and discuss revenue-share terms
I run a local senior center and want to discuss partnering on a community game event.
I represent my university physics society and want to discuss a potential advertising partnership to run an educational campaign in your games.

contents.text: For media and press inquiries, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to our media relations team.

navigationGoals: Reach media relations to obtain a quote for my upcoming article.
I'm a veteran journalist seeking to arrange an interview with your media relations about your veteran hiring program.
Request the official press kit and embargo details for your upcoming API release for a tech blog feature
I'm writing a story for our neighborhood paper and need to speak with someone in media relations.
I’m a student journalist researching physics engines in social games and would like to schedule an interview with your media relations team.
